data.name: Unearthed Arcana 2025: Subclasses Update
entries: This playtest document is part of a series of {@i Unearthed Arcana} articles that present material designed for upcoming products. The material here uses the rules in the {@book 2024 Player's Handbook|XPHB}.

entries.name: What's Inside
entries: This document presents five subclasses: revised subclasses for the {@class Barbarian|XPHB} ({@class Barbarian|XPHB|Path of the Spiritual Guardian|Spiritual Guardian|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate} and {@class Barbarian|XPHB|Path of the Storm Herald|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}), {@class Fighter|XPHB} ({@class Fighter|XPHB|Cavalier|Cavalier|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}), {@class Monk|XPHB} ({@class Monk|XPHB|Warrior of Intoxication|Intoxication|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}), and {@class Paladin|XPHB} ({@class Paladin|XPHB|Oathbreaker|Oathbreaker|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}).

entries.name: This Is Playtest Material
entries: This article is presented for playtesting and feedback. The options here are experimental and in draft form. They aren't officially part of the game. Your feedback will help determine whether we adopt it as official.

items.name: How to Playtest This UA
entries: We invite you to try out this material in play. To play with this material, you may either incorporate it into your campaign or run one or more special playtest sessions. For such a session, you may create an adventure of your own or use a short adventure from a source like {@adventure Quests from the Infinite Staircase|QftIS}.

items.name: Power Level
entries: The character options you read here might be more or less powerful than options in the {@book 2024 Player's Handbook|XPHB}. If a design survives playtesting, we adjust its power to the desirable level before publication. This means an option could be more or less powerful in its final form.

items.name: Feedback
entries: The best way for you to give us feedback on this material is in the survey we'll release on D&D Beyond. If we make this material official, it will be refined based on your feedback, and then it will appear in a D&D book.
Providing feedback on this document is one way you can help shape the future of D&D!

entries.name: Subclasses
entries: This section presents the following subclasses: {@class Barbarian|XPHB|Path of the Spiritual Guardian|Spiritual Guardian|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}, {@class Barbarian|XPHB|Path of the Storm Herald|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}, {@class Fighter|XPHB|Cavalier|Cavalier|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}, {@class Monk|XPHB|Warrior of Intoxication|Intoxication|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}, and {@class Paladin|XPHB|Oathbreaker|Oathbreaker|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}.

entries.name: Path of the Spiritual Guardian (Barbarian)
entries: {@i Call on the Spirits for Combat Aid}

entries.name: Design Note: Path of the Spiritual Guardian Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass (formerly {@class Barbarian|PHB|Path of the Ancestral Guardian|Ancestral Guardian|XGE}) since its last appearance in {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}:

items.name: Spiritual Protectors
entries: (formerly {@subclassFeature Ancestral Protectors|Barbarian|PHB|Ancestral Guardian|XGE|3|XGE}) has been redesigned. The feature now splits the effects of the original feature, along with new effects, as options when you hit a creature while your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} is active.

items.name: Spirit Shield
entries: now scales with your Rage Damage bonus.

items.name: Vengeful Spirits
entries: (formerly {@subclassFeature Vengeful Ancestors|Barbarian|XPHB|Ancestral Guardian|XGE|14|XGE}) is a new feature that allows you to make an additional attack when you roll an 18 or higher on an attack roll.

entries.name: Path of the Storm Herald (Barbarian)
entries: {@i Wield the Fury of the Storm}

entries.name: Design Note: Path of the Storm Herald Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass since its appearance in {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}:

items.name: Storm Aura
entries: now scales with your Rage Damage bonus. In addition, {@subclassFeature Tundra|Barbarian|XPHB|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate|3|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate} has been redesigned to reduce a creature's damage instead of applying {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

items.name: Raging Storm
entries: has each environment redesigned. {@subclassFeature Desert|Barbarian|XPHB|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate|14|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate} now makes a creature that failed the saving throw start burning. {@subclassFeature Sea|Barbarian|XPHB|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate|14|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate} can now chain the lightning bolt to another creature. {@subclassFeature Tundra|Barbarian|XPHB|Storm Herald|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate|14|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate} now deals Cold damage and halves a creatureâ€™s {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

entries.name: Cavalier (Fighter)
entries: {@i Defend Your Allies on Foot or from a Mount}

entries.name: Design Note: Cavalier Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass since its appearance in {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}:

items.name: Unwavering Mark
entries: no longer has limited uses.

items.name: Ferocious Charger
entries: has been redesigned to give a burst of speed during the first round of each combat.

entries.name: Warrior of Intoxication (Monk)
entries: {@i Drink Mystic Brews to Overwhelm and Confound Foes}

entries.name: Design Note: Warrior of Intoxication Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass (formerly {@class Monk|PHB|Way of the Drunken Master|Drunken Master|XGE}) since its last appearance in {@book Xanathar's Guide to Everything|XGE}:

items.name: Mystic Brew
entries: is a new feature that lets the {@class Monk|XPHB} create magical brews that they can drink to gain long-lasting benefits.

items.name: Master Brewer
entries: is a new feature that replaces {@subclassFeature Drunkardâ€™s Luck|Monk|PHB|Drunken Master|XGE|11|XGE}. The feature adds additional beverage options to {@subclassFeature Mystic Brew|Monk|XPHB|Intoxication|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate|6|XUA2025SubclassesUpdate}.

entries.name: Oathbreaker (Paladin)
entries: {@i Obtain Great Power at Any Cost}

entries.name: Design Note: Oathbreaker Updates
entries: Here are the main updates in this subclass since its last appearance in the 2014 {@book Dungeon Masterâ€™s Guide|DMG}:

items.name: Conjure Undead
entries: (formerly {@subclassFeature Control Undead|Paladin|PHB|Oathbreaker|DMG|3|DMG}) now lets you briefly summon Undead to aid you.

items.name: Dreadful Aspect
entries: now loops through the {@spell Divine Smite|XPHB} spell.

items.name: Oathbreaker Spells
entries: has new spells.

items.name: Aura of Hate
entries: now adds its effect to your {@classFeature Aura of Protection|Paladin|XPHB|6|XPHB}. The aura now benefits only Fiends and Undead that are your allies.

items.name: Dread Lord
entries: now imbues your {@classFeature Aura of Protection|Paladin|XPHB|6|XPHB} and can be recharged by expending a level 5 spell slot.
